Package org.github.fussel178.telestion.extension.corfu.generator.parser

Class CorfuConfigParser

java.lang.Object
org.github.fussel178.telestion.extension.corfu.generator.parser.CorfuConfigParser
public class CorfuConfigParser extends Object
Convenience class to read Corfu configuration files and map them to their POJO counterparts via Jackson. It understands:
  • CorfuProjectConfiguration
  • AppConfiguration
  • NodeConfiguration

    • CorfuConfigParser

      Creates a new instance of the Corfu configuration parser.
      Parameters:
      mapper - the Jackson mapper instance that can convert Corfu configuration files

    • CorfuConfigParser

      public CorfuConfigParser​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper mapper, ParserOptions options)
      Creates a new instance of the Corfu configuration parser.
      Parameters:
      mapper - the Jackson mapper instance that can convert Corfu configuration files
      options - custom configuration options to configure the behaviour of the parser

  • Method Details

    • getProjectConfig

      public CorfuProjectConfiguration getProjectConfig​(Path projectRootDir) throws ParsingException
      Returns a Corfu project configuration in POJO format from the root directory of the Corfu project.
      Parameters:
      projectRootDir - path to the root directory of the Corfu project
      Returns:
      the entire project configuration in POJO format
      Throws:
      ParsingException - throws when errors during parsing of the configuration files occur

    • getAppConfigurations

      public List<AppConfiguration> getAppConfigurations​(Path appsDir) throws ParsingException
      Returns a list of app configuration in POJO format from the apps directory of a Corfu project.
      Parameters:
      appsDir - path to the apps directory that contains the apps with their configurations
      Returns:
      a list of app configurations in POJO format
      Throws:
      ParsingException - throws when errors during parsing of the configuration files occur

    • getNodeConfigurations

      public List<NodeConfiguration> getNodeConfigurations​(Path nodesDir) throws ParsingException

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      a list of node configurations in POJO format
      Throws:
      ParsingException - throws when errors during parsing of the configuration files occur
